cards.effect: Return compromised infrastructure to secure state.

cards.effect: Return compromised infrastructure to secure state.

cards.flavor: Turn back the clock to before the attack
cards.effect: Return compromised infrastructure to secure state.

cards.name: Malware Removal
cards.flavor: Digital exorcism
cards.effect: Return compromised infrastructure to secure state.

cards.name: Zero Trust Architecture
cards.flavor: Never trust, always verify
cards.effect: Can be played as any Shield or Fortify card. Infrastructure requires 2 matching exploits to become vulnerable.

cards.name: Security Operations Center
cards.flavor: The watchers on the digital wall
cards.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of the attacker's deck. You may play up to 2 reactive cards on your next turn without reducing your AP.

cards.name: Defense in Depth
cards.flavor: One wall might fall, but seven walls stand strong
cards.effect: Can be played as any Shield card. Infrastructure with this shield automatically gains a fortify effect when shielded.

cards.name: Threat Intelligence
cards.flavor: Knowing the enemy before they strike
cards.effect: Can be played as any card type. View the attacker's hand and choose one card for them to discard.

cards.name: Security Automation
cards.flavor: Security at the speed of code
cards.effect: Can be played as any Response card. After playing this card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Bug Bounty Program
cards.flavor: Finders keepers, but we fix the bugs
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards. You may play an additional Response card this turn.

cards.name: Quantum Encryption Firewall
cards.flavor: Even quantum computers can't crack this
cards.effect: Shield ALL infrastructure simultaneously. Shielded infrastructure cannot be exploited for 2 turns, even by wildcard attacks.

cards.name: AI Security Orchestration
cards.flavor: Security that thinks faster than attackers can act
cards.effect: Can be played as any card type. After playing, automatically counter the next 2 attacker cards played this turn without spending AP.

cards.name: Honeypot Network
cards.description: Decoy systems that trap and analyze attackers
cards.flavor: Come into my parlor, said the spider to the fly
cards.effect: When attacker plays any Exploit or Attack card, they must discard 2 additional cards from their hand. Draw 1 card for each card they discard this way.

cards.name: Cyber Warfare Division
cards.flavor: The best defense is a good offense
cards.effect: Look at attacker's hand. Choose up to 3 cards and force them to discard those cards. For each card discarded this way, restore 1 compromised infrastructure to secure state.

cards.name: Fortress Protocol
cards.description: Emergency lockdown of all critical systems
cards.flavor: When all else fails, build higher walls
cards.effect: Immediately fortify ALL infrastructure, even if not shielded. Fortified infrastructure requires 3 matching exploits to become vulnerable for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Time Paradox Backup
cards.flavor: Sometimes the only way forward is backwards
cards.effect: Reset ALL infrastructure to secure state. Attacker must discard their entire hand and draw 3 cards. You draw 2 cards and gain 2 AP.

cards.name: Adaptive Defense Matrix
cards.description: AI-powered shield that learns from attack patterns
cards.flavor: Each attack makes it smarter, each block makes it stronger
cards.effect: Shield infrastructure. If this shield blocks an attack, all infrastructure gains temporary immunity to that attack vector for 1 turn.

cards.name: Infrastructure Backup Protocol
cards.flavor: When one system falls, three more take its place
cards.effect: When infrastructure is compromised, immediately shield 2 other random infrastructure. If no infrastructure available to shield, draw 2 cards instead.

cards.name: Quantum Entanglement Shield
cards.flavor: Attack one, and you attack them all
cards.effect: Shield 2 infrastructure simultaneously. If either is attacked, both shields activate. If both shields are destroyed, attacker discards 1 card.

cards.name: Overload Surge Protector
cards.flavor: When the storm hits, we batten down the hatches
cards.effect: Reactive: If attacker plays 2+ cards targeting the same infrastructure in one turn, cancel all attacks and make that infrastructure immune to exploits for 2 turns.

cards.name: Critical System Redundancy
cards.description: Creates backup systems for critical infrastructure
cards.flavor: Two is one, one is none
cards.effect: Fortify infrastructure. While fortified, this infrastructure provides +1 AP per turn. If compromised, you immediately gain 3 AP as emergency resources.

cards.name: Cascade Failure Prevention
cards.flavor: Breaking the chain of destruction
cards.effect: Can be played as any Response card. Additionally, for the rest of the game, when attacker compromises infrastructure, they cannot exploit adjacent infrastructure on the same turn.

cards.name: System Purge Protocol
cards.flavor: When in doubt, wipe it clean and start fresh
cards.effect: Restore target infrastructure to secure state. Additionally, remove all vulnerabilities from this infrastructure.

cards.name: Vulnerability Scanner
cards.flavor: Finding problems before they become disasters
cards.effect: Cancel target exploit card. Additionally, look at top 2 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Emergency Lockdown
cards.description: Instant protection when systems are under attack
cards.flavor: Red alert! All hands on deck!
cards.effect: Shield target infrastructure. Cost is reduced by 1 for each vulnerable infrastructure you control.

cards.name: Security Audit
cards.flavor: Finding and fixing every hole in the armor
cards.effect: Restore target infrastructure to secure state. Additionally, opponent discards 1 card.
